name: Correct & Perfect All-In-One Color Correcting Palette
about: What it is:.What it does:.This palette contains:.What else you need to know:
ingredients: Setting Powder:.. Talc, Lauroyl Lysine, Zinc Stearate, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Octododecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Nylon-12, Silica, Phenoxyethanol, Mica. (+/-) Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Ultramarines (Ci 77007), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Carmine (Ci 75470), Manganese Violet (Ci 77742)......Color Correcting Cream:.. Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Octyldodecanol, Mica, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Jojoba Esters, Polyethylene, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Retinyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Montmorillonite, Illite, Dimethicone, Kaolin, Phenoxyethanol. (+/-) Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Chromium Oxide Greens (Ci 77288), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Red 6 (Ci 15850). ..*Contains Carmine as a color additive.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..-Using your finger or stila One Step Complexion Brush #33, apply sparingly to imperfection until area is neutralized. .-Follow with your favorite stila foundation and concealer. ..-For added correction, finish your makeup with the yellow and lavender finishing powders...-For tips, tricks, and techniques from the stila artistry team, use the instruction card included with the palette or refer to our product videos and instruction card.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: None of the formulas are good except the lilac. They all cake or apply patchy. Its a shame because the actual pigment colours are amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bomb. Always has been always will be. Dont get why people are spending so much buying each individual color of correctors nowadays but if yall wanna save some money STILA is and will always take the crown for color correctors. As a makeup artist this is one of my most repurchased products. The blend wear and finish I get with both the creams and the powders doesnt compare to any of the new color correcting  concealers that have came out recently. Ive probably tried every corrector under the sun on my clients and myself, and guys- take it from me, it doesnt get better than this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this a while ago and I love it so much. It's always a life saver when I have acne and even when I don't there's nothing to make my makeup go from good to great like beginning with this. The powders are also amazing. They hold my makeup great all day and don't look powdery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this. It has so much potential. Sadly, it sucks. The color payoff is non-existent. The cover girl color correcting sticks are eons better than this palette. The only element is this palette I enjoyed was the violet powder. I returned this product and went and bought a violet powder.

My rating is based on the condition in which the item arrived.  I received a product someone else had tried. The three first colors have finger marks.  Sephora, check your returned products to make sure they havent been used or touched.  Nobody wants to buy a dirty product touched or tested by other people!!.    Im returning it and reordering.  I trust that the product is actually good since there are so many colors to be mixed and used according your skin tone, and based on other good reviews.   Such a shame I have to waste my time going to the store to return. The product is out of stock in my area so Ill have to order online and wont receive it on time for my event.

reviews.review_title: Good not great but all in one
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good coverage but not easily blendable. I am fair so use the main colors for under eye circle and the green for redness but it can look cakey and not blended. Maybe it needs to warm up in the skin more before blending

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used the green on my acne scarring, and peach and pink under my eyes and on top with Patrick Ta foundation and contour!! Love it! See ya later scars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this every day, yet it has lasted for so long. I think I've had it for two years. I really only use the top 3 colors (neutral beige/pink/yellowish shades), mostly under my eyes and around my nose where I have a lot of redness. I wish I knew how to use the other colors, but when I've used the green in the past, I found it was hard to blend out, and left me looking a bit ill. I don't know how to use the powders.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way. Really impressed by the range of colours and what they can do. Good quality for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted this to be awesome, but it just didnt work for me, didnt last and it creased. Not sure if I was applying incorrectly, but I returned it and went back to Becca eye brightener and concealer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My brother got a cup stuck on his face and it cause a lot of red and purple bruises all around his mouth. Using just this pallet, I was able to make it disappear. Very very impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for what feels like years for good color correctors and I felt like they never worked well until this palette.  It is truly amazing, I get very dark under eyes and this covers them completely.  It also lays great under makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is too thick and did not do much for me. Returning it

reviews.review_title: Tried to give it five stars!!  (??)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my goodness, I forgot how much I really LOVE this stuff. I have impossible, dark circles & NOTHING ufffchides them. Orange, lite beige, powder:perfect! Not sure why I could only get four stars. ufffcothcocorrectors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Brilliant idea, adorable packaging, but the formula creased and I couldnt get it to blend. Sad, sad tears.

reviews.review_title: Helps with my no make up look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just got it in the mail today and Im suprised how much it blends better than my old color corrector. I think the purple powder is great for my no make up days.  I have a lot of acne scars  so Id say it did well.  Not to mention dark circles!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried every influener-pushed under eye concealer under the sun and this is by far the best. This formula sits under eyes without creasing or getting cakey. I use the green to correct a lot of redness in my face and its allowed me to wear a lot less makeup. The super concentrated colors provide great coverage. Will be using this pallet to its last drop.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: good but could be more blend able, wish green was the biggest color

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try the orange corrector and I have liked Stila products in the past, but all of these are for light skin tones. All the correctors seem spotchy and look like play makeup on dark skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually used the HD under painting palette from Makeup Forever which I love, but wanted to try something new. I love this, has all the colors I need, and has been hiding acne/dark marks. Love.

reviews.review_title: Color correction with a variety of uses
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the color correctors in this! Even though I can use this palette as a base, I tend to use it alone. Im happy it doesnt settle into my fine lines and every time I get a pretty, even skin look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this product I mostly use the orange for my under eyes and the green for acne spots and I love it. The orange works so well for my under eyes, I put concealer over it and then use to purple powder to set it. anand it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect color correcting combo. It has worked great for those days I dont feel like putting on a full face of makeup but still need to cover under-eye darkness and face redness.

reviews.review_title: worth the surge and works like a charm
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's worth the hype and worth the $50. I was unsure about this product because it seems a lot of money for some concealer. I've used color concealers by other prestigious brands before but I wasn't impressed with it. Well, this is worth it. It takes a little practice and a little playing around. It doesn't matter what your issue is: dark circle, sun spots, redness, they cover it all.   The formula is very creamy so a little goes a long way. You can and should mix the colors for a more custom look. I wish I bought it earlier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm new to color correction  this works so well. great quality great packaging and easy to follow instructions  10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Blends in really well and did not cause any breakouts or dryness. Stayed put till the end of the day masking most of the redness.

reviews.review_title: Perfect Color Correcting Palette For 40+ Crowd
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Cant tell you how many concealers Ive tried. Didnt need concealer, needed this correcting palette. Im middle aged and my skin is getting more pigmented and u201cthinu201d, especially my eye lids. Concealers sit heavy, fake and crease on my skin. But this palette transforms my face and under and upper eye areas.  I can blend both powders to set color this neutralizing miracle palette does!  I wear it without foundation, just a light layer every morning when I hit Pilates class. Corrector stays put and does as advertised.  Blends very well but would recommend more to those with aging skin. So far, this is my favorite product of 2022. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very interesting product! I love the variety this compact palette gives you. The product is very creamy and easy to blend out. You dont need to use a lot of it, a little goes a long way with this formula. I like it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this palette it works well for me I really try not to wear a lot of foundation.  But do find concealers so much better for the skin in the summer. It is creamy moisturizing and stays in place love it.

reviews.review_title: How did I not know about this sooner?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I somehow missed the memo on color correcting palettes, despite being a makeup junkie. Gave this a try and was in shock after using it. It looked like I had foundation on after Id blended everything! Not in a heavy wayu2014a little goes a long wayu2014but in a u201coh my gosh, where did my imperfections go, I havent put on full coverage foundation yetu201d way! The compact is a great size and is really pretty. Its a great little setup with powder as opposed to some others with only creams, and theres a nifty little covering for the creams so you dont get your powder and powder brush in the creams. Been using this every day since I got it and I actually look forward to it, because its fun to see the transformation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After having my second baby I STRUGGLED hard with dark circles under my eyes. This palette saves me every day. Its very creamy, which is good for my dry skin, but if youre oily this might be a skip. I dons use the green (no blemishes) or bright orange (too pale) colors much, but its worth the price for the rest of the colors and powder. Will purchase again.

reviews.review_title: if I could give zero I would
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Like others, I really wanted to like this. The only nice thing about this is look of the palette.  Its very pretty, inviting and made me want to buy it. DONT make that mistake. It conceals NOTHING!!! And I dont even have dark circles, just a tiny tint under my eye and it couldnt cover it up. Its also very oily. I have no idea what they were thinking when testing this. Crap.

reviews.review_title: The only correcting palette you need
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down the best do it all correcting palette Ive ever used. The creams are very rich and highly pigmented so you only need a little to do a lot. The real *chefs kiss* thing for me is the little plastic clear door that covers the creams. Best detail ever. The creams stay moist and dont dry out and you dont accidentally brush powder all over them.

reviews.review_title: I wish the pinkish color was sold separately.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product didn't work for me, however, my sister has one and uses it regularly. The little pink pan is the best (right hand corner of the palette).  I found that I didn't need any of the other colors, and asked the SA if the pink color was sold separately as a highlighter or brightener.  She said it is only available in the palette, and directed me to the One Step Correct as a possible alternative; this turned out to be a poor substitute.  Maybe the faint pink lines on my face and dark circles need something stronger than what's offered in this palette -- or perhaps I just don't know how to properly use it, despite the nice little set of instructions enclosed in the box (much appreciated).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product because recently I have noticed some hyperpigmentation and darkness around my mouth and lip area. I usually go for a light to medium foundation coverage because I really dislike seeing my makeup cake, especially around my eyes. I was nervous to try this still palette for the first time on the day that I had a wedding to attend. And WOW! This product is absolutely amazing! First, it was so easy to use and the consistency of the product is perfect; creamy and not too thick. My foundation applied beautifully over the corrector. My makeup looked so flawless! I even noticed my wrinkles and fine lines appeared less visible. Ill use this product forever and Ill never go without it when I want to feel, and look my absolute best! You NEED this! Buy it!!

reviews.review_title: 50 Years Old, First-Timer - its a miracle!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Whoa, didnt even know it was possible but wow. Love it. Get a double ended brush though and blend/buff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how detailed the u201chow tou201d pamphlet is and even on the package. Have these weird blue veins on my eyelids that never disappear and being super pale doesnt help but this helped SO MUCH! So many other uses for acne and etc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this mostly to correct my dark under eyesu2026 and I love everything BUT the under eye corrector. The rest are awesome and the mirror wraps this up to be great at traveling. But if you have bad under eyes like myself, it will provide some coverage but concealer will still be a necessity

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have really red cheeks and this has become a must for a full beat or honestly just on its own with some highlight and setting powder and Im good to go!

reviews.review_title: This is one of my new favorites.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. I use this with Stilas one step correct. They work great together. Its perfect for my crazy, multi-colored face. I struggle with dark under eyes, redness on my nose, cheeks and chin and red/dark marks from past pimples and damage. Usually I use one step correct alone, which I absolutely love, but since I got this there hasnt been a day I put on makeup that I havent used it. I wanted to add something that gave me a way to zone in certain problem areas, more precisely, and this was 100% it. The top left peach color gives me issues sometimes blending and can be dry, if I dont moisturize well (the reason for a 4 star)  but besides that I absolutely love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is perfect for someone like me with redness in the center of my face and dark under eye circles. High recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. I use the pink, orange, and yellow creams as part of my routine for my awful dark circles (under and over eyes), whether as color corrector or as primer. I set my concealer with the yellow powder which works better than a loose powder for my delicate/dry under eye skin. The purple adds such a natural pretty highlight to my dull skin. I hope this product never goes away, I cannot find a purple powder like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I never used this kind of product before. I am so glad I decided to try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product overall.  - under eye coverage is good for fair and dry skin, but it does get caught in fine lines/wrinkles/eyelid crease so I would spend extra time blending that out and setting it with powder  - I never used the dark orange since my skin is fair/light  - very convenient as you get all the concealer you need in one palette

reviews.review_title: Yes! I not only recommend, I highly recommend!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! It does all it says it does. I got this to give as a gift and ended up keeping it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had been wanting to try this and finally bought it when it went on sale. It honestly does wonders for my dark circles...I tried many things and this really works! I like the pink highlighter and the purple powder as well, it really just highlights - no shine - no glitter- just natural...for a day when you want an all natural look. Nice product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I remember how much I wanted to buy this. When I did buy it, it did change how my dark circles looked and redness. I dont use it anymore because I do believe it cakes your makeup and make it look more oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this item while it was on sale, as I am always looking for a new color corrector. When it arrived, it was oily on top, but as most cream products separate, I decided to give it a try. I used it twice (peach & pink shades for my dark circles) and both times, I had watery and itchy eyes after applying the product that lasted the remainder of the day. Giving it two stars, as the cremes were pigmented and did as they said they would. But unfortunately, returning it due to the irritation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Id been on the fence about trying this for a while, so I bought it during the VIB sale. Im glad I went for it, as its the first color corrector Ive found to be truly effective without leaving a strange cast on my skin. The shades work equally well for spot correcting and covering larger areas. Ive even used it over primer while otherwise going bare faced. Overall, I definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this correcting palette specifically for the green corrector (for redness) and decided to try the other correctors while I was at it. I like the two orange/beige under-eye correctors - they do a good job of concealing dark circles. However, the redness corrector really dries out my skin even after I moisturize well and apply primer. Its disappointing so I will stick to using liquid correctors. When I apply my foundation overtop, the green corrector literally disappears and it looks like I havent put anything underneath so I have to go back in again with my regular concealer on top (creating an unnecessary layer of makeup).   I use the pink eye brightening corrector which I have neutral feelings towards. I can do with or without it. I use the beige colour corrector as a concealer. I dont use the 2 powders In the palette; I just dont see a need for them for myself but other people may find them useful. The palette comes with an instruction booklet to show you where to apply the different colour correctors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: looks terrible under eye... patchy, doesn't blend, creases. Had to return it. And most importantly - it doesn't hide dark circles and is way too sheer.

reviews.review_title: Good, but careful if you're over 30, girl!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Careful if you're over 30, girl! I really like this color-correcting kit. HOWEVER, over the last year it hasn't looked quite as good as it used to look. This is because it is very thick so it settles terribly in your lines. The plus to that is very good coverage. So if you are over 30 I suggest you do not use it all the way up to your bottom lid. Instead, apply it sparingly to take away hints of red, blue, and purple. Then use a lightweight concealer to go slightly higher. And don't forget to live your lines. Those are indicators of living a life! u2665ufe0fu2665ufe0fu2665ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first time I used a corrector because I have pesky dark under eye circles and skin blemishes from old pimples that refuse to go away. Different concealers just didnt do the trick. The instructions to this palette are easy to follow. The texture of each corrector is nice and easy to apply. I was able to experiment to try to find the best application to minimize the discolorations. Although it seemed to do the trick upon application, it didnt last and often times I found that the blemishes were pretty much back to pre-application. I would use this in combination with my trusty concealer. I also compared the effect on my skin with the concealer and with or without the correcting palette and it really didnt show a difference. I have no objections to the quality of the product. Im just disappointed it didnt provide additional benefit to what I already use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has helped me so much with my uneven skin tone. It also really helps hide my under eye bags. Overall, I use it daily and really enjoy the creamy formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved it because the package explains exactly what color does what. Not a fan of a plastic flap that prevents the colors mix. It was just annoying and helpful. Do you need color corrector OR a better concealer

reviews.review_title: Has a cheat sheet glued on the back! So helpful!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best all-in-one color corrector. The best part about it is the legend on the back with reminders about which color corrector to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is ABSOLUTELY the best product in my makeup kit - a must have! Get the Stila complexion dual brush for the right amount of product, and added detail and blending. All-day coverage, application guide included! My absolute MUST-Have!

reviews.review_title: Great Color Corrector and Setting Powder
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Don't use it as concealer if you have dry skin around your eyes. It works great as color correctors and the setting powders are amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is AMAZING!! I did one eye and took a picture to notice the difference and it was drastic! Definitely will continue to purchase once this one is empty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is all you need when it comes to color correcting. Stila did a great job of including setting powders in the palette, so you dont have to carry a separate product to lock in the cream application. The flap that protects the creams from powder falling into it is genius. Application is super blendable, maybe a bit too slick if you try to layer it on. Coverage is medium and lasts almost a full day, depending on if you get oily/sweat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At 74, of course I'm starting to get some crepey lines under my eyes which are dry, plus a little discoloring. This does a good job of neutralizing those issues.  I warm it in my fingers and sometimes use a little eye cream to apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This colour correct palette is so nice. It is exspensive, however if you break down what you get and  also factor in the convenience of this product its a really good deal. I was looking for green colour correct specifically and as I browsed I noticed a lot are in the $30 range. Then I saw this and that its really not that much more expensive and you get all these extra colours on top of just green. I dont find I use this every single day but its nice to have the other shades for dark undereyes, blemishes etc. One really nice feature is it comes with a instruction manual and even has a Description of what each colour can do on the actual package so if you end up losing the manual the description of what each colour can do on the actual package so if you end up losing  The manual  you also know how to use the entire product and each colour. I will mention that the pallet is travel friendly as well as sturdy. The packaging is really something special to look at as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this palette. I had no issues with the color going quickly, as I only use it in small amounts. I have generally clear skin, but experience some redness and under-eye circles and mostly use it to correct minor imperfections before putting on foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have the Mask of Pregnancy, which includess the dreaded melasma mustache.  I've tried quite a few products which were either too thick or didn't provide enough coverage.  This palettes works wonderfully for me. I especially like that it holds up during humid days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: it looks me a while to actually purchase this palette after wanting it for so long because I thought I wouldn't use all the colors. I actually use all the colors and they all work great. I docked 1 star because it doesn't have great staying power. I definitely need to reapply through out the day. That being said, I still love it and find that it hides the deep purple corners of my eyes really well, as well as some broken capillaries around my nose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Light, creamy easy to use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This palette stepped up my makeup game! I would not call myself anywhere close to an expert but I am absolutely astonished on how even and clear my skin looks when I use this product under my concealer and foundation. I would recommend this gem is anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love! The colors are perfect and it really corrects my skin tone. Worth the money

reviews.review_title: Love this! Hit pan on EVERYTHING!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive never hit pan in any palette before and I did with every single color in here!!! Powders are great, the cream are blendable and pigmented! For someone who loves color correcting this is for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I find it unnecessary. The red and green correcters i rarely use, and the pressed powders cling to skin texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I find myself using my MAC Conceal and Correct Palette more than any other palette, but this is wonderful for newbies.  Keep in mind if you don't plan to use some colors for daily use, it remains pleasant to have colors on stock for emergency use....(green for pimples or sunburn, orange for bruise or embarrassing hickey).  I absolutely love the the finishing powders that Stila offers in this palette.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far my favorite color correcting palette! I used all of the peachy cream color so my only wish is they would have a replacement. The light pink also works wonders under my eyes in order to brighten it up. Do yourself a favor and buy this! Stila is cruelty free which is the reason I stated buying them in the first place.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: good for dry skin. blends well. great coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wanting this product ever since it came out! And when I was in my local store a few weeks ago, I got it on SALE!!! And Im so happy with this purchase, the powders blend so nice on the skin and the creams cover exactly what you need!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love it, price needs to go down

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has served me better than expected. I still use other concealers, but overall, this has worked wonders on my recent problem-skin, especially using the green to neutralize redness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. Works as advertised.  A little goes a long way. Really love Stila products

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Becoming a constant in my routine!   From black undereyes, veins, acne, and scars; this palette helps you cover all of those! Easy to use w handy guide!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been buying this product for years. The creams are such a perfect texture and the plastic flap to cover them so the mirror stays clean is genius. Plus the packaging is so pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this palette because it was packaged perfectly for all my skin correcting needs but ended up with a fair share of issues. There is nothing wrong in the formula both the powders and creams . They color correct effectively and has not caused a breakout till date . My issue is with the tackiness of the orange cream.Even after blending it with a beauty blender, it manages to make it through sheer- medium coverage foundation and mixes with it to giving an unwanted hue.This problem was solved by using the correcting powder to set it but it made the foundation cake on top . All the colors work just fine, my only issue is with the orange cream but since it is the one I use the most , I dont pick the palette as often.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good travel size palette

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Well it does work but its too oily for me. I only use a tiny amount because it feels so heavy on the face. I will say the purple powder is amazing for covering dark circles!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Its okay it helps but Im curious as to the purple powder still ever thing else is creamy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ive had this for about a month and only have used it 3 or 4 times. I really wanted this work and I really wanted to love it but its really oily. It separates almost right away under my eyes when I use the orange  one. It like pills up when Im trying to blend it. The peach is ok but doesnt mask my under eye dark circles. The green doesnt hide blemishes and gets really dry. To top it all off, like others have mentioned, it easily blends away. Just not a good product for my skin unfortunately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was excieted to try this , but the texture was either oily and moved around or it was drying and caked on. I have Dry sensitive skin and wanted to color correct acne scars, dark circles, and brighten. Unfortunately the colors were there but the texture wasn't consitant and was unable to make it work for myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this palette!  My only complaint is the color fix colors go very fast and that the purple powder is too hard.  I have a very fair complexion and couldnt even use 2 of them.  Different complexion choices should be available and/or refills.  I cant afford to be buying this palette every month!

reviews.review_title: Nice quality, used more than others
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This palette taught me how different colors even out skin tone. It was definitely worth the buy, but now that I have used up certain colors, I will be purchasing the colors I use versus the whole palette again.

reviews.review_title: I wanted to buy, but disappointed
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried it in a store under eyes and green for rosacea. While I was in store for 20 minutes, under eyes concealer accumulated in small lines. Green has a good coverage, but I have dry patches on my cheeks and it makes them more noticeable. Overall it looks worse than without it - not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The undereye colours and purple setting powder are the best!! I plan on repurchasing this item just for for two colours alone. Amazing palette.

reviews.review_title: Not good at all, don't waste your money!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this having high hopes but was very disappointed.  It was not effective, it would crease badly, hardly any pigmentation, the pallete did not work well at all.  The powder portion was too light with hardly any pigmentation.

reviews.review_title: A must have for your makeup kit!
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Corrects all my little imperfections and my face looks flawless with foundation afterwards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the correctors and concealers in this palette! The green really covers red, the pink really brightens the under eye area, the yellow and orange really conceal under the eyes, and the peach also conceals everything else. The powders at the bottom also add a nice finishing touch. I do wish, however, Stila made this palette refillable as I am almost out of green.
Love this. Works so well on my skin and feels so light.

I bought this palette desperate for help with my dark spots. I've tried all types of foundations and concealers and all they did was turn my dark spots grey. I used the peach cream on my spots and then applied my foundation, and I was amazed at the results. While it doesn't completely hide the discoloration, it definitely made my spots less noticeable. It works!

okay so this little package is beautiful! I was surprised how heavy it was. The colours are very concentrated and creamy. I like the little plastic cover over the cream pans. Nice touch. Good stuff l. The orange covers my undereye dark circles and the green covers acne spots completely!

Whenever I use any of these under my eyes (pink, peach, orange, and yellow) it creases and dries up like crazy. They cling to dry patches on my face and make my normal skin look dehydrated and flaky. I like the pigment but the formula is trash!
Love this palette. Wish Stila sold the pressed purple powder separate because it is life changing!

so helpful. I applied each corrector where needed (fantastic descriptive map) and let it set while doing a couple other tasks. then applied my foundation as usual and I must say it worked out great! it didn't rub off and it's not visible through my foundation. I will definitely use this again and again.

Overall I thought it was okay. It was very creamy and the power gave it a nice finish. I returned the product because I didn't see a difference and darks spot was still not covered. The green one seems to be the least effective. Not worth the price

This is my first step into color correcting and I absolutely love it! I've used Stila before and trust the brand and it does not disappoint. The green, orange and pink are my go to to fix dark circles and redness or blemishes, it's super pigmented so you don't need much and it goes on smoothly and blends in under foundation.  This is an excellent product for a beginner with a little bit of everything you could need or want.
best correcting palette ever I was lucky enough to to get the last one at my local sephora I like the cream powder duo and the instructions are are ez and helpful

This is a great palette! I don't use the darker colors but the green, peach, lighter peach and powders are easy to use and do a great job! I have super sensitive skin and this doesn't irritate it at all. Highly recommend!
Love this palette. However it must be used under foundation. As I don't use foundation everyday, I use a couple of the colours and still love it!

I got this all-in-one pallet to try out color correctors. I definitely use the green the most and not much of the powders. Giving it 4 stars because would like a bigger green option, but can obviously just buy a color corrector specifically for redness.
I have never bought any correctors before and a while a go a had some acne and redness so this is was my all in one package . It's easy to work with and I love it so far

Absolutely obsessed with this color corrector. This is perfect to cover problem area and set with a the powders for a no make-up look. Makes your skin look flawless and even and doesn't leave any undertone of the colors. Definitely worth the price for everyday use. It doesn't have a strange scent to it but other than that, no complaints. Highly recommend!

Some of it blends away and I need more of the Orange and green compared to the peach and other colors. It's creamy but it's not super pigmented, it's pretty light coverage. It doesn't cake up under concealers and stuff, but I don't really have a use for the purple toned powder. I do like the packaging tho and it gets the job done

The only bad thing about this palette is that there should be more of the green, yellow and pinks, and less of the bright red. The pink concealer on the left blends perfectly with my skin, and doesn't cake after powder is applied. Great palette!

I love this palette. I never thought I needed color correction until I tried this and I had to have it. I use the green, pink and yellow creams the most as well as the pink powder. My only qualm is that I wish the green and yellow creams were larger. Also, I don't really have a use for orange. Maybe in the future they can make these in different varieties for different skin tones.

It's pretty good considering that you get such a variety of colors. I'm a fan of the setting powders it's a great palette to help learn how to color correct. I don't see myself repurchasing it but I really did enjoy it.
Very nice pallet, only gave 4 stars because there is not enough of the most needed colours (green and peach)
I really feel in love with this product it covers my dark circles and conceals great! The only down side is it doesn't come with enough Green and yellow.

I have OBVIOUS dark circles. The best I have ever been able to do before this is make them less noticeable. Tried the BECCA under eye brightener and hated it. Went into Sephora to try this in person before ordering and fell in love! The creams are so light, you feel like you aren't wearing anything, but so pigmented that they actually COVER the dark circles. A little of this, a little concealer and they are GONE! By the time I was done, the sales rep that was helping me was sold and wanted to buy one too. I also love that I got it for one purpose but now I have the means to deal with any other colour correcting issue as well all in one place! More convenient and less $$$ than having to buy separate correctors.  LOVE!
Love the ease of use and that a little goes a long way. Immediately saw a difference. I also liked the small clear separator over the creams to keep the powders from contaminating them. Good product!
Everything you need to color correct... great quality as well!

This pallet is an all in one, high-quality, color correcting champion!  I have the driest of dry skin, acne scars, deep dark purpleish-blue circles under my eyes that are hereditary, and occasional redness/blotchiness and this product takes care of ALL of these issues.    A little bit goes a long way, and I found if you set your cream right away (with one or both powders), sometimes even before you finish your entire face, it sets better.  I am a medium skin tone with neutral-olive undertones & I mix the orange and peach creams for the perfect Dark circle corrector.  some days I do not even need to put on concealer or foundation after using this palette, and trust me when I say my skin is far from perfect!!  I sometimes can't even get coverage that I want using full coverage foundations!!!  This is a staple in my beauty arsenal -I can't live without it!!!

I love this palette, it works great for many different needs I have and is my go to on a daily basis. The only thing I wish Stila would do is sell the colors individually - I use up every color and then just have the dark orange left. Or sell different shades where they don't include the orange for lighter skin tones.

I've been using pretty much only Stila products for the past 12 years.  I hesitated using this thinking I wouldn't know how to use it or it wouldn't work or it would irritate my skin.  I used it today for the first time and it worked!  I didn't pile it on like some people do.  I just patted the creams in the places I needed it, blended a bit with my fingers and then finished with my BeautyBlender (also a new purchase). I then finished with Dior foundation and Laura Mercier setting powder and my very red face looked flawless. I don't even feel like I have make up on.  I feel beautiful today. For the first time, I feel like my skin didn't get in the way of my make up and I had so many compliments.

I have rosacea and one eye with a purple under eye and this little kit will handle both conveniently. Even before my foundation, my completion looked great. I'm fair, reddish skin, with reddish blond hair.
Covering up monstrous scabs from zits, red marks from psoriasis, and spooky under eye circles...all one A.I.O stila color palette at a time
It blended well but it doesn't have enough green and orange .

This is the perfect color correction pallet! Some are a powder for the lightest layer- perfect for under my eyes! But some are a cream when you need a little more coverage-perfect for skin spots! The compact is outstanding. The mirror is huge! The creams have a little glass cover to protect from the powder dust. Very well thought out. You get a lot of product for your money, yet the compact is small enough to tuck in your bag. LOVE!

I love this compact because it includes all of the necessary colors in cream form, plus 2 powders, (warm & cool) to finish.  But I want to warn that the creamy correctors are heavier, thicker, more highly pigmented, and will require more time blending, and covering with other makeup. Its not meant to be used so much by itself or else you will end up with that literal color on your skin.  At least this way my experience, and I have been comparing a number of color correcting palettes.
This is my everyday go-to product! With it, I'm able to color correct for a natural finish under minimal make up or glam looks!

reviews.review_title: Great if you are new to color correcting
reviews.review_text: After benefiting from all the amazing reviews on Sephora (thanks, everyone!) for so long I'm finally getting around to giving back by writing my own! I'm pretty new to color correcting, and other than lots of samples this is the only color correction palette I have tried.   Pros: Great for people new to color correcting, since it comes with a lot of different shades. I was totally skeptical of the green and honestly would never have tried it if it wasn't included with colors I did want (like the ones for undereye darkness), but now I think it's great. This gives you lots of small things to try and a little guidance, which was great for me.   Cons: I think my major caveat is just that the colors could be creamier and go on a bit smoother - I find mine to be a little on the dry side especially now that I have had this for a couple of months. They still overall are definitely better than *not* color correcting (especially for under my eyes, I'm all about color correcting now), but there may be creamier products out there.   Overall, no regrets about this as a first color correcting palette purchase.

I purchased the product because it came with multiple correctors so I could test muliple colors for the best results. I found the corrector a very drying and after a few hours of wear, you could see lines of demarcation and the covered areas were dry and peeling.

I was excited about this but I was def disappointed. The setting powders are not high quality which negates the point of having them in the set.   The concealer colors are not friendly to all... I got a slight tan for the summer and the yellow and light pink ones both look super ashy. Also the orange for dark circles is so dark that no matter how little you apply it never blends in with the concealer below. The only thing I use is concealer # 1.   I would not have bought this knowing these things now.
Beginner friendly!!!

I have a lot of darkness around my mouth and it is getting worse as I get older. I was recommended this by someone who works at Sephora and I love it. I like the yellow powder. I hit pan on the yellow in my Kat Von D pallet and now that I got this all in one color correcting palette I don't need to re buy that one! I love that this has creams and powders! It's been a while since I've been impressed with a stila product!

I've really enjoyed this palette, but there are a couple things I wish were different.  Mostly I wish that the green pot was bigger - I deal with a lot of redness, so I am definitely going to hit pan on that waaaaaay before anything else.  Also, the green and the other small size pots are just really small.  The brush I use is as big as the pot, so when I swipe some out, I inevitably end up getting green on top of the orange and peach colors, so that's just kind of annoying. I also wish the lavender color was cream instead of powder.  I just think it would be more versatile that way. But overall, as this was my first entry to color correcting, I think this was a really good palette.  It comes with a little instruction pamphlet, and I learned a lot about how to use the orange and green correctly.  I would definitely recommend this for anyone just starting to try color correcting.
I LOVE this!!! I use it about everyday!!!!!!

I don't wear a lot of make up so I was worried this would be a bit much. I was very pleasantly surprised as I can use it when I'm wearing less or more make up!  I'm glad there are directions on how to use which colors otherwise I would be lost. I really love this palette. It is a great investment for my makeup collection!

This is my first color correcting palette and so far I'm in love! I work in a kitchen, so I'm constantly running around and sweating and this stuff doesn't melt or move! I saw a lot of reviews from people saying that it melts off when they put foundation on top of it but I use a Beauty Blender and it doesn't have any issues at all!

This palette is great! I was using the nyx color correcting palette but it was reallt clinging to my (very few) dry spots. This one does not! My best method to applying this so it doesn't rub off is applying a heavy amount of concealer (i use make up forever) and letting it sit on top of the color correction concealer for a minute or two and blend out the concealer with your finger. Setting spray, let it dry then applying foundation with a beauty blender. Makes my skin look flawless and I'm covered in acne scars. With this, you wouldn't even know it.
Absolutely recommend this product for everyone (beginners to experts). Applies nicely, very easy to blend, wonderful formula. I'm 100% buying again!

I was really disappointed with this palette. I bought it mainly for the pink shade to hide my dark under-eye circles, and it didn't work. It would rub off when I put my concealer on or just didn't work well enough to camouflage the darkness. I also didn't find the powders to be that great either. The green cream did seem to work, though.

Beginner friendly (.......XD).One plate fixed every problem I have on my face. One more layer of cc/bb cream or foundation, you are ready to go.   A little suggestion, (may not apply to everyone) if you have lighter skin tone, yellow+pink cream seems better than peach cream for cover your eyes after you applied orange cream (this combination works great on me).   Good luck for you exploring this product and have fun~
Covers up everything that needs to be hidden
I wanted to love this, but the creams are really heavy/waxy and broke me out all over my face. If your skin can take this stuff, then I'd say go for it.
Love this kit. I no longer need any other concealer or foundation. I love that it is all in one. Conceals a variety of issues. Plus is blends really well.
At first, I only picked this because I didn't want to commit to a full size color correct palette. BUT I love it. Very important to look at diagram on the instructions and know that less is more!

I got this mainly to use the green to cover up a broken capillary on my nose and it didn't work. Once I put my concealer on over it, it just seemed to wipe off. I like the peach one for the vein under my eyes. The dark orange one is useless. The yellow one worked okay to cover up some redness, but once again the palette is so oily that it rubs off. I did not try any of the powders. Not worth what it costs.

I waited for a month for this product to become available and I had extremely high hopes, which is why I cannot give it 5 stars. The peach is great for under eyes and also hyperpigmentation, the salmon covers really dark circles spectacularly. I like the pink color but I do not think it really highlights that much. The yellow does not work for my skin tone and did not even mask my hyperpigmentation at all. The green is great but you really have to build it up to get coverage and sometimes it still rubs off when you apply your foundation. The colors are a little too slippery. I still don't understand why the product says to apply corrector, then powder, and then foundation. You should not put liquids over powder. I even tried it the way Stila says just to be sure and it made a mess. I really like the powders and I like the set up, with the little plastic piece over the creams to protect them. I still use the peach and the green color every day and I like them, I just don't think the whole kit is worth 5 stars. I would recommend this kit if you are new to color correcting and want to try all of these shades, plus I feel that the powders are a good value for the price.

I LOVE this palette! The green works perfectly to correct my rosacea and a little goes a long way. I use a combination of the pink, salmon and orange to correct around my eyes and the result is flawless. Definitely set the creams before applying foundation to avoid smudging the colors. A little expensive, but worth it for those unhappy with an uneven skin tone.
One of the best palettes I have gotten. I use it everday!

It was my first time hearing about color correcting, and I was skeptical about trying it, but I'm so glad I did. I absolutely love being able to make my red marks on my face become basically invisible as well as making my dark circles disappear, I would recommend this product to my friends.

reviews.review_title: Perfect Solution in a Small Package
reviews.review_text: This product absolutely does what it says. I use it almost daily and I don't need much to get it to balance out areas where I may have dark circles or red marks. I love every single section of this product as it really balances my skin to one shade so that when applying make up, it looks so natural. Awesome, awesome prodcut.

This product serves its purpose well. It is beautfully packages and the colors are vibrant. I have fair skin and even the darkest orange color blends well to hide my dark circles under my foundation. The only thing that I do not entirely love is how oily the product feels on my skin. It may be just me, but it does feel a bit heavy and oily upon application. Other than that thought - this is a great product and does what it is supposed to!.

This along with the Clinique foundation stick makes my skin FLAWLESS. It really is that little thing I put underneath my makeup that really tones me out but I don't look like a ghost with only one skin tone. I have to say I'll be purchasing another

Must agree with others who say the creme correctors are very slick and do not stay put in targeted areas, while I do like the powders provided I have exfoliated and moisturized properly. The one big drawback is accessing the powders without getting bristles in the cremes, even with the cover over the cremes. Won't buy again.
I tried following the instruction they gave in booklet, but instead of covering dark circle for me, it looked like it enhanced it! I returned it for store credit :(
these do a great job of covering my pretty bad sunburn and under-eye darkness. do with there was a tad more product but still so awesome

This product offers great ability to be exact in your color correction. It's easily blend-able under foundation of any kind, or you could use just this if you want to do small spots. I wish there was more of the light highlight color, rather than the mid orange, but it's likely that everyone will use one more than the other.

Surprised at all the negative reviews! This product and one of my other foundations from Sephora are the only things that cover my imperfections/acne well. The orange is too dark for me but I mix it with the light orange and use just a tiny bit of the darker orange. Love the product and will definitely use it for a long time!

I had no idea how to do any of the color-correcting, way back in college maybe. But since I am almost 40 now I needed way more help. This kit not only tells you where and what each is for but where to put and how to blend it. I love it. Its been easy enough to use everyday. I love makeup but am one of those people who are clueless unless i see it.
Love the powders. Cream correctors work well (especially peach tone). Pink and yellow ones are too creamy. Tried them on my eyes (under concealer) and concealer didn't hold well.
I tried this out with high hopes, but I was let down with this palette. The formula is pretty slick and oily and when I went to blend the colors the pigment just went away. I returned it.

Really shocked at all the negative reviews. I have combination skin and did not find this even the least bit oily. My skin is pale with redness on my cheeks and chin (not rosacea), so the green is pigmented just enough for me. My favorite part of this palette is actually the yellow powder. Every other setting powder I've ever used has made me look like a clown, due to my pale skin, but this one is PERFECT! Yes, the orange cream is very dark, but it's meant for very dark circles. It says right in the included pamphlet that you may need to mix the two under eye creams, so that's what I did and it worked out well. My only complaint is that I'll be running out of the green cream long before the others - it should really be a larger amount, since that's what people need the most of.

I was really excited about this product when I saw the video and how amazing the packaging was. First, SUPER oily. Gross oily in fact. I've never put anything on my face that made it oily and dry at the same time. I used it under my eyes and it actually made them so dry they started peeling. And it settles into lines making you age a good 10 years! No matter how sheer I put it on it always went strait into the lines. The green covered the red areas in my face but did NOTHING to hide imperfections. I tried multiple techniques and watched videos to try and do this correctly but it was still terrible. Sending it back!

I bought this as an intro into color correcting as it has a little bit of everything. I liked the feel of the formulas and the buildable coverage. The peach was great under eye concealer to help blur dark circles. Beyond that, I cannot recommend this palette. The makeup looks nice at first, but within a few hours my face looked so greasy because this product is so oily. Even worse, within a few days I started breaking out. At first I I was hoping it was a diet imbalance, but then I starting breaking out bad EVERYWHERE I had been using the green and yellow to cover healing pimples and old dark spots. Bought it to cover blemishes and ended up with a face full of them. Returned it!
Very disappointed. It is very oily and very easily to blend away. Am returning it.

Product is very oily; not pigmented, easily blends away so it deceives the purpose of correcting anything. My skin is sensitive but has never broken out so badly until I used this product. I used it to correct some mild redness in my T-Zone, corners of my nose and my chin. Within 2 days of trying this product, 3 huge zits broke out in between my eye, next to my nose and on my chin. Color correcting is supposed to correct your problems, not cause more issues. Couldn't return this fast enough.

I love the idea of a color correcting palette but this one is so oily. The correcters don't set right and they make my base foundation cake and move. Bummer, I had high hopes. If you're on the dry side then try it out because the colors themselves work pretty well for correcting. But combo/oily gals - stay away!!!

I bought this to play with color correcting. The peach covers my dark circles amazingly. The green isn't as helpful on my redness as I would like but, for me, the amazing dark circle coverage makes this incredible.

I bought this with really high hopes of hopping on the color correcting bandwagon. I have extremely dry skin and dark circles under my eyes, so just about everything I use to try to conceal gives me creases and crepey skin that ages me ridiculously. This was no different. I have light/medium skin with yellow undertones and the orange was too dark for me, but the peach did a great job hiding the dark circles, but within  minutes I looked ten years older because it settled in my lines. If you don't have dry skin, this might work for you, but I am exchanging it for the Algenist Peach color correcting serum. It is much lighter weight and doesn't settle the way this does. The powders are very nice, just not worth the price tag if the other creams don't work for me.

I bought this on a whim while shopping because I have an extremely red face and bought multiple color correctors in green. This was the only palette I bought. I like the green Creme, the light brown Creme and the light pink creme. The purple finishing powder is nice too. I have very pale skin and needed something that would highlight my face. The only issue I've had is it leaves a very oily residue on your face. Two swipes against a sleeve would take this product right off. And you definitely feel like you're wearing make-up. Overall- nice. Will work for some, not for everyone.

Great product! Great selection of colours! It is nice to have both cream and powder selections. Colours correct imperfections and blend nicely without drying skin or setting into fine lines! Would definitely buy again !

Other than the green, these colors are too slick. They're very oily and do not build up very well. I plan to return this and just buy a separate green and red/orange concealer because that's all you really need. This palette is just not worth the money.

I cannot even tell you how much I love this palette! I have beyond horrible brown eye circles under and all around my eyes. The peach COMPLETELY gets rid of them. I have always been insecure about them because not only does it not look good but it is for me caused by a medical condition. With lightish skin it looks gross. This product is beyond amazing and the fact that it is cram and powder mix makes it the best by far! It is a must have! It corrects everything beautifullyu2764ufe0f

This is the first time I've used a color correct, so I wanted an all-in-one to see what works for me. These are super creamy with an awesome texture and easy to blend, but it also means they can be a little too sheer, and I have some issues with creasing when using them under my eyes. I am experimenting with improving this through using primers and setting powders. I will probably purchase a couple of individual color correctors that suit my needs best next time, but this was a pretty great place to start.

reviews.review_title: Love.... but not exactly for all skin colors.
reviews.review_text: The red-ish orange is SUPER pigmented and doesn't work on my pale skin.  The rest of the colors are lovely though.  You will probably have to use a sheer foundation just in case though.

The only reason I'm giving this palette 4 stars is because the green, peach, and pink creams should have been a little more thicker or pigmented. They are very light and almost sheer. If you are looking for heavy coverage, there are better correcting creams out there. However, the red correcting cream is PERFECTION and hides my dark circles really well. I also love both powders. In the picture, I am wearing the red cream corrector under my eyes, followed by the peach corrector, topped off with my usual concealer (not Stila), and followed by the purple powder. I used the yellow powder on my entire face to set my makeup. The products are easy to blend (some might find them a bit oily) and do not crease. Overall, I think this is a great palette to have, especially when travelling or on the go.

I do like this kit overall for color correction. It is very pigmented and blends easily into your skin. My biggest problem with it is how oily it is. I have to make sure to put on extra powder when I use it so I don't look super greasy. The green also once blended doesn't completely hide the redness of pimples, so be sure to use lots of layers with this product. It is awesome for travel though and I will use it, but probably won't buy it again because of the oiliness (not to be mistaken with creaminess).
This is perfect for traveling has everything you need for imperfections in your skin to make it look flawless
Perfect corrector for me, love it. The creams are... creamy ! They blend perfectly, and no creasing in my fine lines. Love love love. I do not use my other corrector.
This is my first serious corrector palate and I'm so pleased with it. Excellent coverage for dark circles and blemishes and I love playing with the colors and easy-to-follow instructions

I've just found a replacement for my Armani corrector this palette is amazing!! I'm late 30's and have dry under eyes and dark circles from years of nursing shift work and genetics. I use both the deep orange and peach colours to make my perfect correction shade on my light/medium skin tone. The green shade holds up well to cover redness on my t zone combo skin. Super creamy when applied then dries to an almost powder like finish I couldn't be happier with this product!!

All of the colors work perfectly on my light/medium skin with neutral undertones. They're super pigmented, so I can see this lasting quite a while. The colors blend like a dream and don't stick to the dry spots on my combination skin. Hydrating without the shine! The setting powders are also amazing. They keep the creams from settling in creases, which is a problem I've always had. Even the packaging is perfection. There's a plastic flip cover (not a film sheet!) to keep powders out of the creams and a how-to guide on the back of the palette. I use this over NARS Velvet Matte Skin Tint and I look airbrushed without the weight of the usual foundation and concealer. I love this!

reviews.review_title: Great texture but some colors are useless
reviews.review_text: Most hydrating cream concealer I have used! However, not all colors match my fair skin tone and the quality of the powders is not high. This product works better for people with medium skin tone.

I've only had this a couple days, but I can't believe how amazing it masks dark circles and brightens under the eye.  I love the texture of these creams. They blend in great and don't feel thick on this skin.  The powders are also great.  I noticed that this lasted all day on me.  My mom tried out my palette and loved it so much she ran out and got it.  I think it's great because there are darker and lighters colors so you can customize depending on your skin tone.  A great purchase.
Amazing for all aspects of color correction, very blendable, pigmented and good for all skin types!

I LOOOOOOVE that this palette contains 5 super pigmented concealers, and that the instructions are on the back AND on a separate pamphlet.  I find that when I used this palette my under eye circles didn't come out as much at the end of the day, which is quite the miracle. Stila never disappoints!

This palette is one of the best things I've purchased so far! It actually does what it says, and I've used numerous products that claimed it would cancel out the redness but haven't! But this stila palette completely changed my make up routine! Highly recommend :)
We all need a little color correction in our lives. The Stila palette is beautiful and covers all of my flaws.

This product is amazing. It's pricey but worth the money! I have used other colour correcting products and they were not good. They would rub off after foundation application or they would peek through the foundation because the colour was so dense. This is not the case with this palette. The colour correcting colours are creamy yet thin enough to avoid detection under the foundation. I have normal skin, with hormonal breakouts near my period. I also have some dark under eye circles. This product covered everything up and gave me a flawless finish. Will definitely be re-purchasing!

Great product, goes on smoothly, very visible difference just after couple strokes. I have dark circles and visible sun damage on fair skin, got covered them perfectly with a very natural look. Will use every day.

This is the best all in one color correcting palette ever.  Not only does it work, it stays on all day, it comes with instructions on how to apply it, it has a built in cover over the creams, and the texture is perfect.  I am so glad I purchased this, and I will be purchasing it again.

Great palette! The correctors don't enhance my fine lines and are buildable. I love that I will get use out of every color in the palette. I definitely do not have to wear as much foundation because of these correctors.

I was a little skeptical about this pallet, but I love stila products so I wanted to get it a shot and I'm so happy I did! I have a ton of red patches on my face and super dark circles under my eye but this pallet makes those all go away! It comes with a little booklet that shows you what each color does and where to put it so it makes it super easy. My face has never looked more flawless after using this product and I would recommend to anyone who has uneven skin.

reviews.review_title: Everything I've ever wanted in one palette!
reviews.review_text: I received this a few days ago and I'm already in love. For my NC20 (2Y05) skintone, this palette is a god send! The creams blend very easily and the powders melt into the skin. I like that there is a little plastic divider that covers up the creams, which is especially helpful when I'm picking up the powder (I was originally nervous that this might be messy, but the cover takes that out of the equation) Also. the palette is breath-takingly gorgeous. Overall, I'm incredibly pleased with this purchase!

I'm glad color correcting is becoming a trend for spring/summer! I love everything that stila does and this is no exception! This is a very nice palette for beginners as it has all the basic colors and guide in one place. The formula could be creamier yes but it makes it easier to control the amount applied. I wish there was a purple cream but the powder formulas are great! The one thing I wish it had was a brush to go with it. Overall it's a great palette to start color correcting with to find what works for your particular correcting needs, it's great for travel, and it's very user friendly. Had there been a brush included of suggested to use in the collection I would have given it 5u2b50ufe0f!

I did a review and demo of this product on my YouTube channel (Makeup by Amy Michelle).  First I will say the concept is amazing. I love the fact that there is a plastic flap over the cream correctors so they stay sanitary and clean. Second, I love how there are descriptions of the colors and what they are used for on the back so that you know exactly how to use the product. Lastly, the finishing powders in this palette are absolutely amazing. I wish they would make the lavender finishing powder as stand alone. The cream correctors do dry to a almost a powdery finish. I'm not super impressed by the actual cream corrector part I think there are quite a few other brands that have better correctors out there. However, I will definitely keep the palette since its great for travel and the powders alone or worth keeping.
